document.full_text: israeli prime minister benjamin netanyahu said on monday the killing of osama bin laden by u.s. forces was a triumph for washington and its allies in their "war on terror."
document.title: israel says bin laden killing triumph for democracies
lines_and_colors: israeli prime minister benjamin netanyahu said on monday the killing of osama bin laden by u.s. forces was a triumph for washington and its allies in their "war on terror."
